allow: Bash(# Query through the admin auto-status endpoint curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/admin/auto-status?season=2025"")

Bash(# Check if weekly_stats has data for weeks 11 and 13 curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/admin/auto-status?season=2025"" | jq . || \\ curl -s -X POST ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/admin/run"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""season"": 2025, ""week"": 11}'')

Bash(# Run snapshot for week 11 echo ""=== Running Week 11 Snapshot ==="" curl -s -X POST ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/admin/run"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""season"": 2025, ""week"": 11}'')
Bash(# Check if there''s a server issue curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/health"")

Bash(jq . echo "" echo "Trying week 11 snapshot with longer timeout..." curl -s --max-time 180 -X POST "http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/admin/run"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -d '{""season"": 2025, ""week"": 11}')
Bash(# Check updated games played distribution curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/usage-agg?season=2025&weekMode=season&position=ALL&limit=20"")
Bash(# Check a specific player with Routes = 0 \(Luther Burden III\) curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=17&q=Luther%20Burden&limit=1"")
Bash(# Check if snap count data exists for week 17 curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=17&position=WR&limit=20"")
Bash(# Check source snap count data for week 17 curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=16&q=Luther&limit=1"")
Bash(# Check overall snap data quality for week 17 curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=17&limit=100"")
Bash(# Check if gold ETL data exists by looking at the snapshot columns curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=10&q=Ja%27Marr&limit=1"")
Bash(# Check by querying a different week with potentially more data curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=5&position=WR&limit=5"")
Bash(# Verify RZ and 3D metrics are now populated curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=17&position=WR&limit=10"")
Bash(# Check which snapshot ID is being used curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/search?season=2025&week=17&position=WR&limit=1"")
Bash(# Check snapshot meta for week 17 curl -s ""http://localhost:5000/api/data-lab/health"")
